price: 150. Wonna hinnay Yalli sin Awlaytuuy usuk sin cateleeh sin dacrise-lek korosut cato mafaxina, usuk Sinam çatta haytaamak inkih khayrih Aysuk Raaqak kay Amri oggola.
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلنَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: bali al-lahu mawlākum wahuwa khayru al-nāṣirīna
